reviewText: Pandit Pran Nath is one of the most important musicians of the 20th century, forever shaping avant-garde music through his students La Monte Young, Terry Riley, Jon Hassell, Henry Flynt, and more. This brief, yet dope, documentary gives us a small look at the legend himself. Bonus: see Terry Riley making some hilarious faces. Necessary for all who must know about the history of drone.
